DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness safety Dysport® domestic Botulinum Toxin Type A ( manufacture Lanzhou Biologic Product Institute , P.R . China ) treatment hemifacial spasm .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Effectiveness Safety Dysport® Treatment Hemifacial Spasm
DOC.criteria: Patient suffer hemifacial spasm least 6 month duration ( prior visit 1 ) Cohen scale ≥ grade II Botulinum toxin type A treatment history within last 16 week prior visit 1 Hemifacial spasm secondary facial palsy Previous alcohol phenol injection surgical therapy facial muscle Requirement botulinum toxin injection site ( ) body study
